entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • system.net.mail.functional.tests fail in CI #72818
  • CertificateRequest: when ECDSA named curve is unrecognized, confusing exception raised #72816
    Future
  • [wasm] Ensure subtleCrypto is usable from Blazor app #72810
    7.0.0
  • Unused struct argument loads can be dropped by inlining #72808
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT will not generate a RUC warning if its inside an attribute #72805
  • Blazor WebAssembly error with new build: Can't find bindings module assembly: System.Private.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript #72803
    5.0.x
  • [NativeAOT] Investigate the reflection invoke test failure in DiagnosticSource #72801
  • DLR ignores unmanaged constraint when picking overload #72799
  • [API Proposal]: Add a TeeReader to allow doing multiple computations from the same stream without buffering to disk or re-reading stream #72798
  • [mono] Reduce loader lock contention in class loading #72796
    8.0.0
  • Vector256.Shuffle does not produce optimal codegen #72793
  • Unable to Copy/Create file on NFS share on macOS #72786
    Future
  • Blazor Server SPA is returning 'Soft 404' error while accessing an URL/page directly from SEO crawler #72778
  • [libraries-pgo] NRE in System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.TypeInfoResolverFunctionalTests.DoNotSerializeValue42 #72775
    7.0.0
  • Unix Domain Sockets: deleting file at sockPath is allowed while socket is listening for connections #72774
  • Bizarre behavior of string.StartsWith #72770
    Future
  • Assertion failed '!comp->opts.compJitEarlyExpandMDArrays' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #72768
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'vnWx != NoVN' during 'Redundant branch opts' #72767
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Small-typed LCL_VAR nodes in modulo transform lead to bad codegen #72763
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] implement `JSImport` generator `AllowUnsafeBlocks` diagnostic #72760
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\JitBlue\\Runtime_71375\\Runtime_71375\\Runtime_71375.cmd #72759
  • Test failure baseservices/exceptions/simple/ParallelCrash/ParallelCrash.sh #72755
  • [wasm] `System.Runtime` tests failing with uncaught exception on Windows/AOT/chrome #72752
    7.0.0

Closed

  • CoreCLR non-Windows cmake build error #53466
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Use sourceName in templates #64235
    7.0.0
  • Children could not evaluated in Blazor Web Assembly. #66401
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][aot] Test failure - `System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests.MarshalTests.MarshalPrimitivesToCS` #69681
    7.0.0
  • Publish single file blazer server for osx-arm64 executable segfaults #70588
    6.0.x
  • [wasm] Improve native table generation. #61706
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Cannot get location for a loaded assembly (`Assembly.Location`) #52062
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Unit.Tests are disabled in WASM #58226
    Future
  • wasm aot failed to compile benchmark test ByteMark.BenchAssignRectangular. Linker issue? #56917
    7.0.0
  • Browser AOT debugging #44619
    7.0.0
  • [Mono] Tracking runtime test failures on Mono Interpreter backed WASM #44663
    7.0.0
  • Update webassembly tests run to support homebrew v8 install #46317
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Emit a warning if runtime pack version doesn't match the cross compiler, as part of the build #51235
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: APIs to support tar archives #65951
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][wbt] - Microsoft.Playwright.PlaywrightException : net::ERR_UNSAFE_PORT #72436
    7.0.0
  • Failed Assembly.Load and Assembly.LoadFile leaks memory #58093
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed '!compDonotInline()' during 'Morph - Inlining' #64787
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Tracking issue for failures due to stack overflow #69810
    7.0.0
  • Impersonation cause FileLoadException #47416
    7.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Tracing.Tests Fails on iOS and tvOS #51382
    7.0.0
  • Refactor hosting and assembly loading to improve reliability, perf, and portability #59227
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] `Csc` task failing with `Unexpected exception:` - ` (ReleaseMutex failed. WaitOne Id: 13 Release Id: 13)` #70836
    7.0.0
  • Vector256.Create() randomly throws PlatformNotSupportedException #72506
    7.0.0
  • Clarification about the pulling behavior of the Parallel.ForEachAsync #72806
  • [libraries-jitstressregs] Assertion failure !CREATE_CHECK_STRING(!"Detected use of a corrupted OBJECTREF. Possible GC hole.") #72697
    7.0.0
  • Epic: GC Regions Support #43844
    7.0.0
  • CryptoStream .Read truncates the decoded byte array depending on the input length of the encoded one #72797
  • [wasm-ep] Add a hook to start an EventPipe Session from runtime startup #69674
    7.0.0
  • `getSIMDStructFromField` is not resilient against struct reinterpretation #71219
    7.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.Physical.Tests Failure on Mono in runtime-extra-platforms #72288
  • 0x800705AF - "The paging file is too small for this operation to complete" in Mono_Release in runtime-extra-platforms #72290
  • System.Text.RegularExpressions work planned for .NET 7 #62758
    7.0.0
  • System.Tests.TimeZoneInfoTests.NJulianRuleTest crashing on Linux arm #64134
    7.0.0
  • ActiveIssue not skipped on CI for iOS/tvOS devices in Release Configuration #59488
    7.0.0
  • Mono CI Utilization Improvements #61017
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] `v8` crashing with AOT on perf pipeline #71840
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration intermittent failures #72101
    8.0.0
  • Document SRM regex approach/algorithms/terminology in README.md #60917
    7.0.0
  • JIT: typeof() is not propagated/folded #71909
    8.0.0
  • ViaHeaderValue throws on TryParse #72677
    7.0.0
  • DeflateStream truncation detection is buggy #72726
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandlerTest_HttpClientHandlerTest_Headers_Http11.SendAsync_GetWithInvalidHostHeader_ThrowsException #72756
  • NativeAOT: type initialization crashing at runtime #72782
  • In Mono runtime, `Type.GetTypeCode` returns improper value for an enum nested in a generic class #72543
    7.0.0
  • GetGetMethod().MethodHandle.GetFunctionPointer() #72781
  • Graphics.MeasureString returns negative width for a string of spaces #72766
  • Extra jmp in code #72776
  • Test failure readytorun/determinism/crossgen2determinism/crossgen2determinism.sh #72753
  • [HTTP/3] Stress test failures for GET Aborted scenario #72619
    7.0.0
  • Cannot serialize/deserialize entity with default value of nullable enum type #72674
  • JSONSourceGenerator: JsonSerializerContext requiring implementing all functions in partial class #66203
    Future
  • [wasm][eat] Failure in System.ComponentModel.ReflectionCachesUpdateHandler #57456
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable the ConvertToLibraryImport diagnostic by default #72819
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Fix Idna Test #72817
    area-System.Globalization, 7.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Trying to add support for building WBT with multiple runtime packs #72815
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Allow trimming away `ScopedRefAttribute`. #72814
    linkable-framework, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-preview7] Remove npm audit call in CI #72813
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Removing console.debug message helper to make debugger work. #72812
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix Enumerable.Chunk throughput regression #72811
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Include EventLog.Messages in WindowsDesktop pack #72809
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Diagnostics, 6.0.x
  • Initial unification of DynamicMethod to be shareable between runtimes #72807
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • [release/6.0] Support zero-byte reads on raw response streams in SocketsHttpHandler #72804
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [WASM] Ensure WasmTestRunner is exitting on a non-background thread #72802
    NO-REVIEW
  • [wasm] optimize WebSocket perf for small buffers #72800
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Fix HttpListenerRequestUriBuilder.GetPath's search for `?` #72794
    area-System.Net
  • Fix UnsupportedOSPlatformAttribute usage in System.Net.NetworkInformation.cs #72792
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Annoating Net.Quic & Net.Security libraries to be AOT safe #72791
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Refactor root-level serialization logic and polymorphic value handling. #72789
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • port BitArray.CopyTo to xplat hardware intrinsics #72788
    area-System.Collections
  • Do not reference `System.Text.Encoding.Extensions` on frameworks where it is inbox. #72784
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Optimize `AssemblyLoadContext.LoadFromStream` and fix partial reads. #72783
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add Span.Reverse() intrinsic for Arm64 #72780
    community-contribution
  • Add more DataFlow tests from linker to NativeAOT #72777
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Ensure non generic method defs when using textual PGO #72773
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add markdown readme for System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager #72772
    area-System.Configuration, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fix creating small-typed LCL_VAR nodes in fgMakeTemp #72771
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [QUIC] Stress crash WIP #72769
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Set IsDynamicCodeCompiled as a managed constant to help #72762
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • System.Text.Json - Emit XML comments for public source-generated APIs #72761
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution

Merged

  • [wasm] Move some defaults out of the templates #72626
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: add more inlining bail out checks #72795
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [iOS] Enable Diagnostics.Tracing tests #72545
  • Re-enable the ability to use in-build signing #72690
  • Enable NI_Vector256_Create on AVX1 #72522
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve String.EndsWith for OrdinalIgnoreCase #72750
  • Avoid warning on shlibdeps for symbol log2: it's probably a plugin (Ubuntu building) #72785
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-preview7] Fix ARM64 Unix debugging #72736
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix test regressions #72751
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Dispose of IncrementalHash in CmsSigner #72790
    area-System.Security
  • Include EventLog.Messages in WindowsDesktop pack #72280
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Delete dead code from and fix `getSIMDStructFromField` #71226
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] fix JSIMportGenerator transient reference in-tree #72787
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [wasm-ep] Implement DiagnosticServer and startup sessions for WebAssembly #72482
    arch-wasm, area-Tracing-mono
  • Enable NJulianRuleTest #72707
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.0
  • [mono][llvm] Fix generation of LLVM IR for OP_SSE_CVTII. #72731
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • JIT: teach VN to fold type comparisons #72136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • TryAddWithoutValidation ViaHeaderValue #72741
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1901435 #72729
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix ReflectionCachesUpdateHandler_CachesCleared test in aggressive trim mode #72682
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • Expands a list of always trimmed mobile+web CA with few recently added #72678
    area-CoreLib-mono, linkable-framework
  • Fix SendAsync_GetWithInvalidHostHeader_ThrowsException #72779
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Ensure `GetCorElementType` returns underlying enum type on Mono runtime #72685
    community-contribution
  • Revert "Detect truncated GZip streams (#61768)" #72742
    area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.0
  • Fix ARM64 Unix debugging #72735
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [mono] Include dynamic methods in stacktrace #72732
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono] Avoid transformation from multiplication to left shift in case of 64 bit value #71189
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution

Updated

  • Add CertificateRevocationListBuilder #72708
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact, 7.0.0
  • Add EH filters for generic catch(T) blocks #72721
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix for #70007, fallback to old implementation if optimized way fails #70073
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Implement ControlledExecution API #71661
    area-VM-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] improve startup #72275
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [Mono][Arm64] Instrinsify methods for Vector4 on Arm64 #72124
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Generic attributes handling in CustomAttributeDecoder #72561
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Added DEBUG switches for roundtrip ILASM #72128
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • Contain memory operands under casts #72719
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Consolidate importer spilling code V2 #72744
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fixed HWIntrinsic reflection bug with `NextCallReturnAddress` intrinsic #72505
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bail ThreadAbort redirection after catch handlers on Unix #72705
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [6.0] Re-create MultiCoreJIT profile data on profile-use-only mode #71754
    Servicing-consider, area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • Socket: cancel on-going operations when Sockets with non-owning handle gets disposed. #72000
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Added support for getting members of static structures. #69542
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Update to use Mariner 2.0 as the build image #70111
    area-Infrastructure
  • Emit warning instead of an error in package compatibility check #72518
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, packaging, 7.0.0
  • Revert "Revert "[mono][workload] Add workloads for win-arm64 using emulation"" #68994
    area-Build-mono
  • [DRAFT][MONO] Move marshal-ilgen into a component #71203
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Improve Binary Xml (XmlDictionaryWriter) performance #71478
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Port Windows/MSDTC distributed transactions support #72051
    area-System.Transactions
  • [QUIC] Remove connection state from QuicStream #72599
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add analyzer support to validate the stateless marshaller shapes #72643
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the wrong GCInfo when testing GCStress. #72572
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [release/6.0] Work around for UriFormatException caused by \\?\ prefix in the path #71452
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Configuration, 6.0.x
  • Annotating System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource on AOT #72706
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Convert MemoryMarshal.GetArrayDataReference to a JIT intrinsic #72725
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete more verification code #72747
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Improve tiering performance #70649
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix StreamReader EOF handling and improve perf #69888
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Tear down pending HTTP connection when the originating request completes #71785
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • HTTP/3 Made alt-used show only on alt-svc redirect #72669
    area-System.Net.Http
  • X509Certificates.Tests: make tests pass when rsa+sha1 signing is not supported. #70821
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [iOS] Enable System.Data.Common tests #72554
  • [Android] Introduce NetTraceToMibcConverter task & streamline testing targets #72394
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • perf fixes for high memory load situation #61926
    area-GC-coreclr
  • #53624 enable test suites in maccatalyst #72445
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Allow child process reaping by other thread(library) #70705
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Allow source generation for classes with ignored init-only props #69327
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Add reference assembly for System.Private.CoreLib.dll #72143
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove Http3RequestStream from _activeRequest when response is read/aborted. #72670
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [wasm] make debugger less noisy #72675
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • More precise writebarrier for regions #67389
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add setter to TransactionManager.DefaultTimeout and MaxTimeout. #71703
    area-System.Transactions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [QUIC] Copy managed memory instead of pinning #72746
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Added snake and kebab naming policies to JSON serializer #69613
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Unify invoke code with coreclr #72717
    area-System.Reflection
  • NativeAOT: Guarded devirtualization #64497
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Hash the AssertionDsc struct for faster lookup #72700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [iOS] Remove unnecessary newline from CI script #67861
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-tvos
  • 30% optimization of `DateTime.GetDate()`/`.GetDatePart()` by 'Euclidean affine functions' #72712
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
